original_text: Moses brought all the sticks out of the Tent of Meeting. He showed them to the leaders and they saw what had happened. Each leader took his own stick.
korean_text: 모세가 그 지팡이 전부를 여호와 앞에서 이스라엘 모든 자손에게로 가져오매 그들이 보고 각각 자기 지팡이를 집어들었더라

sentences.original_text: Moses brought all the sticks out of the Tent of Meeting
sentences.korean_translation: 모세가 모든 지팡이를 회막 밖으로 가져왔다

sentences.original_text: He showed them to the leaders
and they saw what had happened
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 무슨 일이 일어났는지 보았다

sentences.original_text: Each leader took his own stick
